name: A Mage Lost (Stephen Limcangco)
description:
You are a wizard who is lost in the forest and must find their way back home. Use your magical abilities of fire, water, earth and air to solve puzzles and reach the goal in each level.

Games Design Studio 1 semester project, Developed by Daniel Bui, Jinhoon Choi, Andy Lang, Stephen Limcangco and Mohamad Win.
